news.title: Israel has committed genocide in Gaza, UN commission of inquiry says
news.summary: The panel finds that four of the five genocidal acts defined under international law have been carried out against Palestinians during the war.

news.title: Jeremy Bowen: UN genocide report a blunt indictment of Israel's actions in Gaza
news.summary: A new report accuses Israel of committing genocide in Gaza, in "the strongest and most authoritative UN finding to date".

news.title: Starmer orders investigation into MI5 over false evidence
news.summary: It will look at why the security service gave false evidence to three courts about conversations with BBC News.

news.title: These teens turned their rooms into tech-free zones. This was the result
news.summary: Elizabeth and Henry are among those ditching technology in their bedrooms to see how they cope.

news.title: Queen Camilla pulls out of Duchess of Kent's funeral
news.summary: Mourners, including the King and other senior royals, will gather later at Westminster Cathedral.

news.title: Former Tory minister Maria Caulfield defects to Reform
news.summary: Caulfield lost her seat at last year's general election, after nearly nine years as the MP for Lewes.

news.title: State pension likely to rise by 4.7% in April
news.summary: Earnings figures for the three months to July are used for the yearly increase.

news.title: Kirk shooting suspect appeared to confess on Discord
news.summary: Tyler Robinson is thought to have discussed the killing on the online platform before his arrest.

news.title: Winter fuel payments stopped for 9.3 million people before government U-turn
news.summary: Official data shows the number of people who received winter fuel payments after now-reversed government cuts.

news.title: Kenya issues arrest warrant for British national over young mother's murder
news.summary: The 21-year-old was killed in 2012 and her body found in a septic tank in the garrison town of Nanyuki.
